mapper.update: update T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD set RR_TIME=#{time},RR_STATE=#{state} where RR_ID=#{id}
update T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD set RR_STATE=#{state} where RR_ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select rr.RR_ID,rr.RR_RESID,rr.RR_RECID,rr.RR_TIME,rr.RR_STATE, r.R_ID,r.R_ACCID,r.R_NAME,r.R_BIRTH,r.R_SEX,r.R_PHONE,r.R_ADDRESS,r.R_EMAIL,r.R_EDUCATION,r.R_MAJOR,r.R_EXPERIENCE from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr,T_RESUME r where rr.RR_RESID=r.R_ID and rr.RR_RECID=#{recId}

select r.RR_ID,r.RR_RESID,r.RR_RECID,r.RR_TIME,r.RR_STATE, r.R_ID,r.R_ACCID,r.R_NAME,r.R_BIRTH,r.R_SEX,r.R_PHONE,r.R_ADDRESS,r.R_EMAIL,r.R_EDUCATION,r.R_MAJOR,r.R_EXPERIENCE from (select rownum rn,rr.*,r.* from T_RECRTUITMENTRECORD rr,T_RESUME r where rr.RR_RESID=r.R_ID and rr.RR_RECID=#{recId} and ROWNUM <=#{show})r where r.rn >=#{current}
